hooks.command: osascript -e 'display notification "Claude needs your attention" with title "Claude Code"' && afplay -v 0.7 /System/Library/Sounds/Pop.aiff
osascript -e 'display notification "Agent needs your input" with title "Claude Code"' && afplay -v 0.7 /System/Library/Sounds/Pop.aiff
osascript -e 'display notification "Task completed" with title "Claude Code"' && afplay -v 0.7 /System/Library/Sounds/Pop.aiff

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); if [ "$pct" -ge 70 ]; then color="\e[31m"; elif [ "$pct" -ge 50 ]; then color="\e[33m"; else color="\e[32m"; fi; reset="\e[0m"; printf "%s | ${color}Context: %d%%${reset}" "$model" "$pct"; else printf "%s | Context: 0%%" "$model"; fi
